}, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Element/Combobox/Style": { "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Element/Combobox/Style", "created": "20220112030937681", "modified": "20230503142737123", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet $:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Tool/FontManager $:/ThemeTweaks/svg/url", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": ".combobox {\n`--`dropdown-button:20px;\n position: relative;\n display: inline-flex;\n padding-right: var(`--`dropdown-button);\n background:<>;\n /*border:2px inset #e3e3e3;*/\n height: fit-content;\n}\n\n.combobox input {\n border:0;\n background:unset;\n width:100%;\n}\n\n.combobox select {\n position: absolute;\n width: 100%;\n opacity:0;\n clip-path: inset(0 0 0 calc(100% - var(`--`dropdown-button)));\n pointer-events:all;\n cursor:pointer;\n}\n\n/*Custom dropdown button*/\n.combobox:after {\n content:\"\";\n position: absolute;\n inset: 0 0 0 auto;\n width: var(`--`dropdown-button);\n background: center / 8px no-repeat;\n pointer-events:none;\n background-image:var(`--`url);\n <$let svg=\"$:/core/images/down-arrow\" fill=\"foreground\">{{$:/ThemeTweaks/svg/url}}\n}", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Element/InputAutoWidth/Style": { "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Element/InputAutoWidth/Style", "created": "20220109194045449", "modified": "20230503142737123", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet $:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Tool/FontManager", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": ".autowidth{\nposition:relative;\ndisplay:inline-block;\nmin-width:100px;\nmax-width:100%;\nline-break: anywhere;\n}\n\n.autowidth :is(input,textarea){\nall:unset;\nposition:absolute;\ninset:0;\nwidth:100%;\nheight: 100%;\nborder: 0;\n}\n\n.autowidth :is(input,textarea)+pre{\nmargin:unset;\npadding:unset;\nopacity:0;\npointer-events:none;\n}\n\n.autowidth :is(input,textarea)+pre:empty:after{\ncontent: 'placeholder';\n}\n\n.autowidth *{\nfont-family:inherit;\nfont-size:inherit;\n}", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/PageTemplate": { "created": "20220131165213792", "text": "<>", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/PageTemplate/app": { "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/PageTemplate/app", "created": "20220131172543964", "modified": "20230503142736500", "tags": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/PageTemplate $:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/PageTemplate/app", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$navigator story=\"$:/temp/ModularStoryList\" history=\"$:/temp/ModularHistoryList\">\n\n
{{$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/PageTemplate/Header}}
\n
\n<$reveal type=\"match\" state=\"$:/state/SideNav\" text=\"show\" retain=yes>\n{{$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/PageTemplate/SideNav}}\n\n

\n<$list\n filter=\"[list[$:/temp/ModularStoryList]]\"\n history=\"$:/temp/ModularHistoryList\"\n template={{$:/config/ui/ViewTemplate}}\n editTemplate={{$:/config/ui/EditTemplate}}\n storyview=\"zoomin\"\n emptyMessage=\"Use the sidebar to navigate.\"\n/>\n
\n\n", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/PageTemplate/app/Style": { "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/PageTemplate/app/Style", "created": "20220131180626685", "modified": "20230503142736211", "tags": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/PageTemplate/app $:/tags/Stylesheet", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\rules only filteredtranscludeinline transcludeinline macrodef macrocallinline html\n\n\n.app {\n/* Couleurs */\n--dark-background:black;\n--dark-foreground:white;\n\n\nheight:100%;\nwidth:100%;\ndisplay:grid;\ngrid-template-areas: \n \"header header\"\n \"sidenav main\";\ngrid-template-columns:max-content 1fr;\ngrid-template-rows:max-content 1fr;\nbackground:var(--dark-background);\ncolor:var(--dark-foreground);\nfill:red;\n}\n\n .app .app-main *{\nborder:unset;\nbackground:inherit;\ncolor:inherit;\n}\n\n.app .app-header {\ngrid-area: header;\nheight:fit-content;\npadding:0;\n}\n\n.app .app-header button svg {\nmargin: 20px;\nopacity:1;\n}\n\n.app .app-header button *{\nfill:inherit;\n}\n\n.app .app-header .app-title{\nmargin:0 auto;\n}\n\n.app .app-main {\ngrid-area: main;\n}\n\n.app .app-nav{\ngrid-area: sidenav;\n}\n\n.app div.tc-tiddler-frame.tc-storyview-zoomin-tiddler {\nposition:relative;\nwidth:100%;\nheight:100%;\n}", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/PageTemplate/Header": { "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/PageTemplate/Header", "created": "20220131174104134", "modified": "20230503142736903", "tags": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/PageTemplate $:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/PageTemplate/Header", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$button class=\"tc-btn-invisible\">\n<$action-sendmessage $message=\"tm-fold-tiddler\" foldedState=\"$:/state/SideNav\"/>\n{{$:/core/images/menu-button}}\n\n\n

<$link to=\"$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Component/Home\">{{$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/ProjectName}}

field=\"caption\"><$text text={{{[{!!title}trim[$:/Modular/Component/]]}}}/>", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/PageTemplate/SideNav/Style": { "title": $:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/PageTemplate/SideNav", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": ".app-nav .tc-menu-list-item .tc-droppable,\n.app-nav .tc-menu-list-item .tc-droppable div:not([class]),\n.app-nav .tc-menu-list-item .tc-droppable div:not([class]) a,\n.app-nav .tc-menu-list-item+.tc-droppable\n{\ndisplay:flex;\nwidth:100%;\nheight:100%;\nposition:relative;\n}\n\n.app-nav .tc-droppable-placeholder{\nposition:absolute;\ninset:0;\nbottom:100%;\nheight:2px;\n}\n\n.app-nav .tc-menu-list-item:hover{\nfont-weight:bold;\n}\n\n.app-nav .tc-menu-list-item div a{\npadding:1em;\nalign-items: center;\ngap:1em;\nfont:inherit;\ntext-decoration:none;\nopacity:.33;\n}\n\n.app-nav .tc-menu-list-item div a:hover{\n{{$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Snippet/CSS/TransitionOpacity}}\n}\n\n.app-nav {\nbackground-color:{{{[[$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Palettes/DefaultDark]getindex[background]]}}};\n}\n\n/* .side-nav .tc-menu-list-item+.tc-droppable{\n\tposition:relative;\n\twidth:100%;\n\tdisplay:block;\n} */", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Palettes/DefaultDark": { "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/plugin.info": { "created": "20230508072658979", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/plugin.info", "type": "application/json", "text": "{\n \"title\": 10:19:57\"\n}", "modified": "20230508081957643" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/ProjectName": { "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/ProjectName", "created": "20220131164908478", "modified": $:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/PageTemplate/SideNav", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "nav ul {\nappearance:none;\n}\n\nnav a {\ncolor:inherit;\ntext-decoration:underline;\n}\n\n/*Pour tiddlywiki : */\n\n.tc-tagged-draggable-list .tc-tiddlylink{\ncolor:inherit;\n}", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Tool/FontManager": { "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Tool/FontManager", "caption": "Font settings", "created": "20220109170838504", "list": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Tool/FontManager [[FontManager/Site Title]] [[FontManager/Tiddler Title]] [[FontManager/Tiddler Body]] FontManager/Fonts/Style $:/FontManager/Style $:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Element/Combobox/Style $:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Element/InputAutoWidth/Style $:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Snippet/CSS/TransitionOpacity", "modified": "20230503142737123", "show-preview": "hide", "tags": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular $:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Tool/FontManager $:/Modular/Component/Settings", "text-sample": "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz", "text-sample.alphabet": "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz", "text-sample.alphanumeral": "ABCabc123", "text-sample.defaults": "alphabet numerals alphanumeral paragraph sentence", "text-sample.numerals": "1234567890", "text-sample.paragraph": "A peep at some distant orb has power to raise and purify our thoughts like a strain of sacred music, or a noble picture, or a passage from the grander poets. It always does one good.", "text-sample.sentence": "Almost before we knew it, we had left the ground.", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\define add-category()\n<$action-createtiddler\n$basetitle={{{[][[/]][{!!text}]+[join[]]}}}\ntags={{{[format:titlelist[]] font +[join[ ]]}}}\nfont-class={{{ [{!!text}slugify[]] }}}\nfont-family=\"\"\nfont-size=\"1em\"\ndefault-font-size=\"1em\"\n/>\n<$action-setfield text=\"\"/>\n\\end\n\n\n<$select field=text-sample default={{!!text-sample}}>\n<$list filter='[list[!!text-sample.defaults]]'>\n\n\n\n\n<$edit-text\ntag=\"input\"\nfield=\"text-sample\"\nplaceholder=\"Text sample\"\ndefault=\"lorem ipsum\"\nclass=\"tc-edit-texteditor\"\n/>\n\n<$let toggle={{{[is[current]tagging[]tag[font]!has[show-preview]limit[1]then[hide]else[ ]]}}}>\n<$button\ntooltip=\"Toggle all text preview\"\naria-label=\"Toggle preview\"\nclass=\"tc-btn-invisible toggle-master\"\nactions=\"\"\"\n<$list filter=\"[is[current]tagging[]tag[font]]\" variable=\"font\">\n<$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field=\"show-preview\" $filter=<>/>\n\n\"\"\"\n>\n\n<$transclude tiddler={{{ [match[hide]then[$:/core/images/preview-open]else[$:/core/images/preview-closed]] }}}/>\n\n\n\n\n<$list filter=\"[is[current]tagging[]tag[font]]\">\n
\n

\n<$link>\n<$text text={{{ [{!!title}removeprefixremoveprefix[/]] }}}/>\n\n{{||$:/core/ui/Buttons/delete}}\n

\n@@.combobox\n<$edit-text field=font-family placeholder=\"font-family\"/>\n<$select field=font-family>\n<$list filter=\"[tag[font-family]search{!!font-family}]\">\n\n\n\n@@\n@@.autowidth\n<$edit-text field=\"font-size\" tag=\"input\" placeholder={{!!default-font-size}} default=\"1em\" autocomplete=\"on\"/>
{{!!font-size}}
\n@@\n
\n<$button class=\"tc-btn-invisible\" message=\"tm-copy-to-clipboard\" param={{{ [{!!font-class}addprefix[.]] }}} tooltip={{{[[class = .]][{!!font-class}] +[join[]] }}}>\n\n<$reveal tag=\"div\" type=\"nomatch\" state=\"!!show-preview\" text=\"hide\" default=\"\" retain=\"yes\" animate=\"yes\">\n<$view tiddler=<> field=\"text-sample\"/>\n\n\n\n<$button\ntooltip=\"Toggle the text preview\"\naria-label=\"Toggle preview\"\nclass={{{[[tc-fold-banner]] [{!!show-preview}] +[join[ ]]}}}\nactions=\"\"\"<$action-listops $field=\"show-preview\" $subfilter=\"+[toggle[hide]]\"/>\"\"\"\n>\n<$transclude tiddler={{{[{!!show-preview}match[hide]then[$:/core/images/preview-closed]else[$:/core/images/preview-open]] }}}/>\n\n
\n
\n\n<$tiddler tiddler=\"$:/state/new-category\">\n<$keyboard key=\"enter\" actions=<>>\n@@.autowidth\n<$edit-text tag=\"input\" placeholder=\"new category\" default=\"new category\" class=\"tc-add-category\"/>
{{!!text}}
\n@@\n<$button\nactions=<>\ntooltip=\"create a new font category\"\nclass=\"tc-btn-invisible\"\n>{{$:/core/images/new-button}}\n\n\n\n\n", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet $:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Tool/FontManager", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": ".text-sample-selection{\ndisplay:flex;\ngap:.5em;\n}\n\n.text-sample-selection input{\n flex: 1;width:auto;\ndisplay: flex;\njustify-content: center;\nalign-items: center;\ngap: .5em;\n}\n\n.text-sample-selection select{\nborder:0;\ndisplay:flex;\njustify-content:center;\nalign-items:center;\nbackground:<>;\ncolor:currentColor;\n}\n\n.text-sample-selection select option {\nbackground:<>;\ncolor:currentColor;\n}\n\n.text-sample-selection button{\nmin-width: 50px;\nheight:50px;\nwidth: max-content;\n}\n\n.typography-category:nth-of-type(n+2){\n border-top:2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, .1);\n}\n\n.typography-category{\n\tdisplay:flex;\n\tcolumn-gap:1em;\n\tflex-wrap:wrap;\n\twidth:100%;\n\tline-height:normal;\nalign-items: center;\n}\n\n/* .typography-category *{\nborder:solid 1px;\n} */\n\n.typography-category:nth-of-type(n+2){\n\tborder-top:1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, .1);\n}\n\n.typography-category-name{\n\twidth:100%;\n}\n\n.typography-category-name a{\n\tall:unset;\n\tcursor:pointer;\n}\n\n.typography-category-name button{\n\topacity:0;\n}\n\n.typography-category-name{\n\tfont-size:.8em;\n\tfont-weight:bold;\n\topacity:.33;\n\twidth:100%;\n}\n\n.typography-category:hover :is(.typography-category-name,.typography-category-name button){\n{{$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Snippet/CSS/TransitionOpacity}}\n}\n\n.typography-category:hover .input-autowidth input{\n/* text-decoration: dashed underline; */\n}\n\n.typography-category .text-sample {\n\toverflow-wrap: anywhere;\n\tflex-grow:1;\n position:relative;\n}\n\n.typography-category .text-sample button{\n\ttext-align:inherit;\n}\n\nbutton.import-font{\ncursor:pointer;\n}\n\n\n.text-sample{\ndisplay: flex;\n}\n\n.text-sample button.tc-fold-banner {\ncursor:pointer;\nfont-size:1rem;\nflex-shrink: 0;\nmin-height: 50px;\nwidth: 50px;\nposition:relative;\ninset:unset;\nmargin:unset;\npadding:unset;\ndisplay: grid;\nplace-content: center;\nmargin-left: auto;\n}", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Tool/FontManager/Title": { "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Tool/FontManager/Title", "created": "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$transclude field=text/>\n\n<$vars newFieldNameTiddler=<> newFieldValueTiddler=<>>\n<$transclude tiddler=\"$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/fields\"/>\n\n", "revision": "0", "bag": "default" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/WIP/Coherence": { "created": "20230502031128720", "text": "* Tiddlers titles must be written in PascalCase\n* The file hierarchy is represented by \"/\", e.g : ParentTiddler/CurrentTiddler", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/WIP/Coherence", "modified": "20230503142953836" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/WIP/Modularity": { "created": "20230502030019907", "text": "Styles should be arranged using @layers and container query.\n\nUse components :\n\n* Template\n* Style\n* Macros\n\nAtomic components are single, self-contained component used in Molecular components, who are a set of components customized to create it's own thing.\n\nTags : $:/Modular/Atomic/Component, $:/Modular/Molecular/Component", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/WIP/Modularity", "modified": "20230503142954070" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/WIP/Performances": { "created": "20230502030051430", "text": "For icons requiring advanced styling/interactions:\n\n* [[SVG fragment identifiers|https://caniuse.com/svg-fragment]] \n** https://css-tricks.com/svg-fragment-identifiers-work\n** https://github.com/FWeinb/grunt-svgstore/issues/16#issuecomment-43786059\n\nCSS background for simpler icons. ", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/WIP/Performances", "modified": "20230503142954178" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/WIP/Principles": { "created": "20230428012923073", "text": "!! Goal\n\nThe goal of ''Modular'' is to help you create your own tiddlywiki edition/custom web app.\n\n!!! Principles\n\n* [[Modularity|$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/WIP/Modularity]]: Code modularly and with ease of customization in mind.\n* [[Documentation|$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/Documentation]]: Provide clear documentation and tools for project management and visual identity.\n* [[UX|$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/WIP/UX]]: Emphasize user experience and accessibility.\n* [[Teamwork|Modular/Teamwork]]: Encourage collaboration and contribution.\n* [[Coherence|$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/WIP/Coherence]]: Keep code and documentation simple and straightforward.\n* [[Performances|$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/WIP/Performances]]: Optimize for performance and efficiency.\n* [[Simplicity|Modular/Simplicity]]: Avoid unnecessary or excessive design elements.", "tags": "", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/WIP/Principles", "modified": "20230507160515887" }, "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/WIP/UX": { "created": "20230502030301332", "text": "Usually the UI/UX design process includes the following steps:\n\n* ''Research'': This involves gathering information about the target audience, their needs, and the business objectives of the project.\n* ''Analysis'': This step involves analyzing the research data to identify patterns, trends, and insights that can inform the design process.\n* ''Ideation'': This step involves generating a wide range of potential solutions to the design problem, using brainstorming, sketching, or other ideation techniques.\n* ''Prototyping'': This step involves creating low-fidelity or high-fidelity prototypes of the design solution to test and refine its functionality and usability.\n* ''Testing'': This step involves testing the prototypes with real users to gather feedback and insights that can inform further iterations of the design.\n* Implementation: This step involves creating the final design solution, including any necessary coding or development work.\n* ''Evaluation'': This step involves evaluating the final product or solution to determine its effectiveness in meeting the user needs and business objectives.\n\n;Tools to provides\n\nUser experience maps associated with each component, describing how the user will interact with the component and in what context.\n\nPersonnas\n\nTool for generating color palette\n\nTool for fonts: Font pairing, accessibility, font manager, Charcode table\n\nBrainstorming: chatgpt integration could help ?\n\nThe graphic rules of your project are described in tiddlers tagged with $:/Modular/Identity", "title": "$:/plugins/Telumire/Modular/WIP/UX", "modified": "20230503142918293" }} }
title: $:/plugins/Telumire/Modular
